comments.author: Grant Ingersoll
comments.body:
Hey Doug,

Here is an attempt at a DOAP for the Lucene Java.  I didn't fill out the maintainer, as it wasn't clear to me who that should be (I would be more than happy to maintain the DOAP file).

I took the descriptions from the website.

Let me know if you need anything else on this.

-Grant

comments.author: Doug Cutting
comments.body: Thanks, Grant.  I just committed this.

description:
Can someone please draft a DOAP file for Lucene, so that we're listed at http://projects.apache.org/?

A DOAP generator is at:

http://projects.apache.org/create.html

Please attach it to this bug report.  Thanks.
